explanation: [0-0] A right hand wearing a brown glove holds a transparent serrated knife, placing it on a yellow foam stick. The foam stick is on a brown tabletop, with a white background.
[0-2] Then, the serrated knife in the right hand cuts down, slicing through the yellow foam stick, revealing its hollow cross-section, and releasing white smoke.

[2-10] Immediately, the scene switches to a serious-faced greyish-white cat, wearing a leopard print outfit and holding a metal shovel in its right paw. It stands beside a thick-soled flip-flop placed on a light brown countertop, with a light brown wall in the background. Then, the metal shovel cuts in front of the flip-flop as white smoke rises. On the left side of the screen, there is a white cat plush toy with the black text "That Little Puff" above it.
